description: THE MAIN OBJECTIVE OF THE ORIJECT IS TO SUPPORT THE GOVERNMENT OF THE MALDIVES TO IMPLEMENT THE PROGRAMME FOR DECENTRALIZED GOVERNANCE AS STIPULATED BY THE CONSTITUTION.

subproject.corporate outcome: Strengthened national, regional and local level capacity to mainstream gender equality and women’s empowerment in government policies and institutions
subproject.description: Strengthen Programme for Decentralized Governance in the Maldives
subproject.gender code: Gender equality as a significant objective
subproject.title: Strengthen Local Democracy

title: STRENGTHENING LOCAL DEMOCRACY AND GOVERNANCE IN MALDIVES
